title: Effects

code_samples.code:
[local] effect <pattern>:
  usable in:
    # events, optional
  parse:
    # code, optional
  trigger:
    # code, required

[local] effect:
  usable in:
    # events, optional
  patterns:
    # patterns, one per line
  parse:
    # code, optional
  trigger:
    # code, required

effect example:
  parse:
    set {_test} to 1
    continue
  trigger:
    # {_test} always starts at 1 here
    add 1 to {_test}
    # 2 is always broadcast
    broadcast "%{_test}%"
